alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 11:48AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...BRIEF PERIOD OF ACCUMULATING SNOW THROUGH EARLY AFTERNOON... A band of snow stretched from near Bigfork to Grand Rapids, MN to Siren, WI at 1140 AM and was moving north-northeast at 25 mph. Through 2 pm the band of snow will impact Grand Rapids, Hibbing, Virginia, Floodwood, Duluth, Aitkin, McGregor, Moose Lake, Hinckley, Cloquet, Superior, Solon Springs, Siren, Minong, and Spooner. Roadways affected include US Highway between Cook, MN and Spooner, WI, Minnesota Highway 210 between Duluth and Aitkin, US Highway 2 between Grand Rapids and Duluth to Maple, WI, and I-35 between Duluth and Pine City. Visibility as low as one-quarter mile and snow accumulation on roads are expected. Be prepared for reduced visibility and snow covered and slippery roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
